titles.title: I will bless the Lord at all times

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will bless the Lord at all times.
His praise shall continually be in my mouth.
My soul shall make her boast in Thee, Lord.
The humble shall hear thereof and be glad.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O, magnify the Lord with me,
And let us exalt His name together.
I sought the Lord and He heard me,
And delivered me from all my fears.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bendeciré a Jehová en todo tiempo.
Su alabanza en mi boca estará.
En Jehová se gloriará mi alma,
Los lo oirán mansos y se alegrarán.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Engradeced a Jehová conmigo.
Y exaltemos a una Su Nombre.
Busqué a Jehová, y Él me oyó,
Y de todos mis temores me libró.
